#summary csvformat - converts a delimited file to csv format.

= Usage =

`csvformat <options> [file ...]`



= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-d||--delim||<delim> ||input field separator string (default: 0xfe)||
||-i||--input||<input> ||input file (default: stdin)||
||-o||--output||<output> ||output file (default: stdout)||
||-n||--no-escape|| ||do not escape internal quotes||
